micro_tips: Actively acknowledge the prospect's perspective and feelings to demonstrate understanding and build stronger rapport.
When objections arise, such as around price or trust, clarify the specific concern to ensure a more targeted and effective response.
After clarifying an objection, briefly summarize the prospect's concern to confirm mutual understanding and effectively guide the conversation forward.
reasons: No long monologue segments detected (healthy pacing).
Objections detected but low empathy signals (handling may be weak).
Closing attempt detected (next step / demo / proposal).
